changeSet.createView: SELECT FSTAT.FILEID "RECORDROWID",FSTAT.NETWORKELEMENT "NETWORK_ELEMENT",FSTAT.ORIGINALFILENAME "INPUT_FILE_NAME",FSTAT.FILENAME "COLLECTED_FILE_NAME",DISSTAT.DESTFILENAME "DISTRIBUTED_FILE_NAME",to_char( FSTAT.CREATEDDATE ,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') "START_DATE", to_char(FSTAT.LASTUPDATEDDATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') "END_DATE", (FSTAT.PARERRORRECORDS + FSTAT.PARSUCCESSRECORDS) "COLLECTED_RECORDS",FSTAT.PARSUCCESSRECORDS "PARSED_SUCCESSFULLY",FSTAT.PARERRORRECORDS "PARSE_FAILURE", FSTAT.PROSUCCESSRECORDS "PROCESSED_SUCCESSFULLY",FSTAT.PROFILTERRECORDS "FILTERED_RECORDS",FSTAT.PROINVALIDRECORDS "INVALID_RECORDS",'0' "ROUTING_RECORDS", FSTAT.PROERRORRECORDS "PROCESSING_FAILURE",FSTAT.PRODUPLICATERECORDS "DUPLICATE_RECORDS",FSTAT.AGGSUCCESSRECORDS "AGGREGATION_READ_SUCCESSFULLY", FSTAT.AGGERRORRECORDS "AGGREGATION_READ_FAILURE",FSTAT.CONSUCCESSRECORDS "CONSOLIDATED_SUCCESSFULLY", FSTAT.CONERRORRECORDS "CONSOLIDATION_FAILURE",FSTAT.DISSUCCESSRECORDS "DISTRIBUTED_SUCCESSFULLY", FSTAT.DISERRORRECORDS "DISTRIBUTION_FAILURE", FSTAT.STATUS "STATUS" FROM TBLTFILESTATISTICS FSTAT LEFT JOIN TBLTDISFILESTATISTICSDETAIL DISSTAT ON FSTAT.FILEID = DISSTAT.FILEID

changeSet.comment: create view for record level statistic report
changeSet.createView: SELECT MFDTL.FILESEQMGMTID "FILE_SEQUECE_MGMT_ID", MFDTL.MISSINGSEQUENCE "MISSING_SEQUENCE", FSMGMT.PARENTDEVICE "PARENT_DEVICE", FSMGMT.REFERENCEDEVICE "REFERENCE_DEVICE", TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(MFDTL.ENTRYDATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') "MISSING_ENTRY_DATE", FSMGMT.MINVALUE "MIN_RANGE", FSMGMT.MAXVAL "MAX_RANGE", FSMGMT.NEXTVALUE "EXPECTED_NEXT_VALUE", FSMGMT.RESETFREQUENCY "RESET_FREQUENCY" FROM TBLTFILESEQMGMT FSMGMT INNER JOIN TBLTMISSINGFILEDETAIL MFDTL ON MFDTL.FILESEQMGMTID = FSMGMT.ID WHERE FSMGMT.STATUS = 'ACTIVE' AND MFDTL.STATUSMESSAGE = 'ALERT.FILEMISSING' GROUP BY MFDTL.FILESEQMGMTID, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(MFDTL.ENTRYDATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY'), FSMGMT.REFERENCEDEVICE, FSMGMT.PARENTDEVICE, FSMGMT.MINVALUE,FSMGMT.MAXVAL, FSMGMT.NEXTVALUE, FSMGMT.RESETFREQUENCY, MFDTL.MISSINGSEQUENCE

changeSet.author: maulikshah
changeSet.comment: create view for hourly file statistics
changeSet.createView: select '1' as RECORDROWID, NETWORKELEMENT as NetworkElement, to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH') as HOUR, to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as DAY, sum(CASE WHEN status like '%FAILED%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as ProcessFiles , sum(CASE WHEN status like '%FAILED%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as FailFiles, count(fileid) as TOTALFILES, sum(a.PARSUCCESSPACKETS) ParsingSuccessPacket, sum(a.PARERRORPACKETS) ParsingErrorPacket, sum(a.PARSUCCESSRECORDS) ParsingSuccessRecord, sum(a.PARERRORRECORDS) ParsingErrorRecord, sum(a.PROSUCCESSRECORDS) ProcessingSuccess, sum(a.PROINVALIDRECORDS) ProcessingInvalid, sum(a.PRODUPLICATERECORDS) ProcessingDuplicate, sum(a.PROERRORRECORDS) ProcessingError, sum(a.PROFILTERRECORDS) ProcessingFilter, sum(a.PROCLONERECORDS) ProcessingClone, sum(a.AGGSUCCESSRECORDS) AggregationSuccess, sum(a.AGGERRORRECORDS) AggregationError, sum(a.AGGFILTERRECORDS) AggregationFilter, sum(a.AGGINVALIDRECORDS) AggregationInvalid, sum(a.CONSUCCESSRECORDS) ConsolidationSuccess, sum(a.CONERRORRECORDS) ConsolidationError, sum(a.DISSUCCESSRECORDS) DistributionSuccess, sum(a.DISERRORRECORDS) DistributionError from TBLTFILESTATISTICS a where filetype != 'REPROCESS' group by to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH') ,NETWORKELEMENT, to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by NETWORKELEMENT,Hour desc

changeSet.author: maulikshah
changeSet.comment: create view for hourly file statistics
changeSet.createView: select '1' as RECORDROWID, NETWORKELEMENT as NetworkElement, to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as DAY, to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM') as MONTH, sum(CASE WHEN status like '%FAILED%' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as ProcessFiles , sum(CASE WHEN status like '%FAILED%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as FailFiles, count(fileid) as TOTALFILES, sum(a.PARSUCCESSPACKETS) ParsingSuccessPacket, sum(a.PARERRORPACKETS) ParsingErrorPacket, sum(a.PARSUCCESSRECORDS) ParsingSuccessRecord, sum(a.PARERRORRECORDS) ParsingErrorRecord, sum(a.PROSUCCESSRECORDS) ProcessingSuccess, sum(a.PROINVALIDRECORDS) ProcessingInvalid, sum(a.PRODUPLICATERECORDS) ProcessingDuplicate, sum(a.PROERRORRECORDS) ProcessingError, sum(a.PROFILTERRECORDS) ProcessingFilter, sum(a.PROCLONERECORDS) ProcessingClone, sum(a.AGGSUCCESSRECORDS) AggregationSuccess, sum(a.AGGERRORRECORDS) AggregationError, sum(a.AGGFILTERRECORDS) AggregationFilter, sum(a.AGGINVALIDRECORDS) AggregationInvalid, sum(a.CONSUCCESSRECORDS) ConsolidationSuccess, sum(a.CONERRORRECORDS) ConsolidationError, sum(a.DISSUCCESSRECORDS) DistributionSuccess, sum(a.DISERRORRECORDS) DistributionError from TBLTFILESTATISTICS a where filetype != 'REPROCESS' group by to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM') ,NETWORKELEMENT, to_char(filedate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') order by NETWORKELEMENT,DAY desc
